keyFacts: The financial statement covers the period from November 1, 2013, to November 30, 2013.
The account balance as of November 30, 2013, was $50.00.
There were no deposits or withdrawals during the statement period, except for a credit of $50.00.
The document includes details about service charges and fees, all of which were $0.00 for the statement period.
The statement emphasizes the importance of reporting errors within 60 days of receiving the statement.
